basics.name: Jiaqi Yin
basics.label: PhD Student in Computer Engineering
basics.summary: PhD student in Computer Engineering at University of Maryland, College Park. Research interests include Electronic Design Automation, Logic Synthesis, Formal Verification, Physical Design, and Combinatorial Optimization.

work.name: Cadence Design Systems
work.summary: Worked on Genus Development team during summer internship.

work.name: Pacific Northwest National Laboratory
work.summary: Worked on SODA-OPT Optimization (System design tool for MLIR).

publications.name: Code-EC: Formal Equivalence Checking for Source-to-Source Code Transformation via Dynamic E-Graph Rewriting
publications.summary: Developed CoDE-EC framework for formal equivalence checking.

publications.name: Equality Saturation for Symbolic Reasoning in Boolean Networks
publications.summary: Best Paper Nomination. Applied equality saturation techniques for digital circuit analysis.

publications.name: Accelerating Exact Combinatorial Optimization via RL-based Initialization -- A Case Study in Scheduling
publications.publisher: IEEE/ACM International Conference on Computer-Aided Design (ICCAD)
publications.summary: Developed Inc-ILP framework integrating reinforcement learning with exact methods.

publications.name: RESPECT: Reinforcement Learning based Edge Scheduling on Pipelined Coral Edge TPUs
publications.summary: Proposed RL-based scheduling framework for Edge TPUs.

publications.name: Exact Memory- and Communication-Aware Scheduling of DNNs on Pipelined Edge TPUs
publications.summary: Developed exact scheduling framework for DNN deployment on Edge TPUs.

publications.name: IMpress: Large Integer Multiplication Expression Rewriting for FPGA HLS
publications.publisher: IEEE International Symposium On Field-Programmable Custom Computing Machines (FCCM)
publications.summary: Enhanced FPGA performance for integer multiplication using equality saturation.

teaching.name: Digital System Design (ECE/CS 3700)
teaching.summary: Taught ECE/CS 3700 - Digital System Design for Fall 2021 and Fall 2022 semesters.

teaching.name: Digital System Design (ECE/CS 3700)
teaching.summary: Taught ECE/CS 3700 - Digital System Design for Fall 2021 and Fall 2022 semesters.

projects.name: BoolE: Exact Symbolic Reasoning via Boolean Equality Saturation
projects.summary: Exact symbolic reasoning framework for Boolean netlists using equality saturation. Reconstruct full adders in technology-mapped CSA multipliers√ó.

projects.name: HEC: Formal Equivalence Checking for MLIR Code Transformations
projects.summary: Comprehensive equivalence checking framework leveraging e-graphs to verify functional equivalence between MLIR programs.

projects.name: RESPECT: RL-based Edge Scheduling for Pipelined TPUs
projects.summary: Reinforcement learning framework that imitates optimal scheduling algorithms for DNN computational graphs.
